title: Bowl
description: The broad bowl rests upon a circular foot rim; the side walls curve outward toward the lip.  Both exterior and interior are glazed in a softly mottled grey-green and mauve.  In the center of the bowl is underglaze cobalt blue and manganese purple design of a stylized bird with wings spread, between foliage elements.  The design is encircled by a double blue and purple circular band.  On the unglazed underside of the bowl is incised the signature "Scheier"
name: Bowl
